paper_abstract: A class of kinetic BGK models for Bose-Einstein statistics are considered for the stationary frame in a slab. Existence of bounded measure solutions is proven for Planckian diffuse boundary conditions with a given total inflow. Compactness properties are extracted from the L 1 part of the generalized Planckian distribution function and the boundary behavior. (c) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An existence result for a quantum BGK model
